description.p: ColorWall is a powerful desktop wallpaper store, manager, downloader, and application that provides users with a vast selection of high-quality wallpapers to choose from.

ul.li: Comprehensive search: search using Colors, Tags, Categories, Resolution, Popularity, Views...
Large collection of Wallpapers: boasts the world's largest collection of online 4k, 8k and Ultra HD wallpapers
Cross-platform support/Multiple backend support: windows, cinnamon, deepin, lxqt, mate, pantheon, kde-plasma-5, unity, xfce4, and even FEH and WAL
Highly optimized browsing experience: infinity-scrollable wallpaper browsing viewport
Built-in Image viewer: preview wallpapers before downloading them
Multithreaded download manager: download multiple wallpapers simultaneously
Smart multiple wallpaper selection mode: select multiple wallpapers you want to download at once
Smart Image metadata extraction: extracts Dominant color, Subject/Theme of wallpaper
Content filtering: including an powerful age filter,to filter wallpaper search
